
```{r}
data <- read_csv("Motor Vehicle Collisions with KSI Data - 4326.csv")

head(data)

cyclists_collisions <- data %>% filter(IMPACTYPE == 'Cyclist Collisions' | INVTYPE == 'Cyclist') %>% select(IMPACTYPE, INVTYPE, CYCLISTYPE, CYCACT, CYCCOND, CYCLIST, LIGHT, VISIBILITY)
cyclists_collisions
#cyclists collisions under light conditions
#severity of collision
```

```{r}
gt(cyclists_collisions)
```
